info.name: [2TC 15] Grinder
info.description:
This is really a [1TC 15] as I was trying to squeeze something into 1 tweet only

If you change "floor(.9+" to "floor(.5+", they become normal septagons.

Not really sure if "gl_FragColor.x = " will work everywhere. For me, that gives red/black theme.
